column12: LOW SPEED CONTAINER PACKAGE FORMING MACHINE
column13: A low speed container packaging machine for applying plastic carriers (9) to containers (42) to hold them in packages comprises, a conveyor (5) moving containers (42) in double rows and introduces them to the carrier applying section, and a couple of starwheels (12) to locate them in synchronous positions below jaw plates (11) which apply the carrier stock (9) to them. The jaws (15) are mounted on the plates (11) which spin on two axis at preset angles with respect to the horizontal and vertical planes and which are located symmetrically with respect to the longitudinal axis of the machine. The plates, upon spinning take the carrier strip (9) from a feedthrough (13) and with their jaws (15), stretch them the carrier so that it fits over the end of the containers (42). A centrally positioned release plate (19) removes the carrier stock (9) from the jaw plates (11) and, deposits it on the containers (42). Once the carrier (9) is applied to the containers (42), these enter a cutting station in which packages of 2, 4, 6, 8 or more containers are formed by means of a cutting system which cuts the carrier stock (9). <IMAGE>
column15: FRANCISCO CERVANTES;;LUIS MIGUEL-DIAZ

column12: Low speed container package forming machine specification
column13: A low speed container packaging machine is provided using a plastic carrier to hold them and comprising a conveyor moving containers in double rows introducing them to the carrier applying section, receiving and moving them, a couple of cogwheels to locate them in synchronous position below the jaw plates, and thus apply them the carrier. The jaws are mounted on the plates spinning on two axis at preset angles with respect to the horizontal and vertical planes and located symmetrically with respect to the longitudinal axis of the machine. The plates, upon spinning take the carrier strip or fastener from the feed through and with their jaws, stretch them for a 180 DEG run and locate it on the containers and together with a suitably positioned release plate, deposit the carrier on the containers. Once the carrier is applied on the containers, these enter the cut station in which packages of 2, 4, 6, 8 or more containers are formed by means of a novel cutting system.
column15: CERVANTES FRANCISCO;;MIGUEL-DIAZ LUIS

column12: PACKAGING MACHINE, AND POWER TRANSMISSION DEVICE
column13: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a low-speed packaging machine manufactured at a low manufacturing cost and used a low maintenance cost by applying a plastic carrier to a plurality of containers to form a packaging body in a complete automatic and continuous manner. SOLUTION: A machine is provided with a reel 8 for a plastic carrier 9, the plastic carrier is passed through a carrier roller 10 from the reel 8, and then, passed through a feed through. A side edge part is folded to prevent inward bending, and to prevent inappropriately mounting on a jaw part 15 of a rotary plate 11. The carrier is mounted on the rotary plate 11 provided with the jaw part 15 after the side edge part is folded. The jaw part 15 is provided with two screw holes for mounting on the plate 11 by screws, and two guide holes for positioning. A groove is formed in the rotary plate 11 for reducing the weight, the power is transmitted to a drive shaft through a gear, the constitution of the device is simplified, and the manufacturing cost, the weight, and the noise are reduced thereby.
column15: CERVANTES FRANCISCO;;MIGUEL-DIAZ LUIS

column12: Low speed container package forming machine
column13: A low speed container packaging machine is provided using a plastic carrier to hold containers and comprising a conveyor moving containers in double rows introducing them to the carrier applying section, receiving and moving them, a pair of cogwheels to locate them in synchronous position below the jaw plates, and thus apply the carrier to the containers. The jaws are mounted on the plates spinning on two axes at preset angles with respect to the horizontal and vertical planes and located symmetrically with respect to the longitudinal axis of the machine. The plates, upon spinning take the carrier strip or fastener from the feed trough and with their jaws, stretch the carrier for a 180.degree. run and locate it on the containers and together with a suitably positioned release plate, deposit the carrier on the containers. Once the carrier is applied on the containers, the containers enter the cut station in which packages of 2, 4, 6, 8 or more containers are formed by means of a novel cutting system.

column12: LOW SPEED CONTAINER PACKAGING MACHINE.
column13: The invention provides a low speed container packaging machine employing a plastic belt to clamp them, and consisting of a conveyor that moves containers in double-row, introducing them to belt application section, receiving and moving them, a couple of nylon toothed stars to locate them in synchronous position under plates with clamps and, thereby, placing belt on them. Clamps are mounted in plates which rotate on two axes displaced at predetermined angles with respect to horizontal and vertical planes, and symmetrically placed with respect to machine longitudinal axis. Plates, when rotating, grasp belt strip or guiding tray fastener, and with clamps thereof stretch it during a run of approximately 180(, and place it upon containers and together with suitably placed releasing plate, place belt upon containers. Once belt is placed on containers, these enter cutting station, wherein packages of 2, 4, 6, 8 or more containers are formed by a novel cutting system.

column12: Low speed packaging machine includes feed trough and jaws to bend the edges of plastic carriers to be applied to containers
column13: A low-speed packaging machine, to apply plastic carriers 9 to containers and comprising a conveyor 35, a reel carrier 6, a release central plate and driving shaft, further comprises a double role carrier feed trough, two removable fixed jaws 15 of inclined plates 11 in two different planes, elements to make the plates spin, a removable device in which the feed trough is mounted, and a support for the trough, plates, the elements, the roller carriers, rollers, and release central plate. The feed trough may have the double role of guiding and prefolding the plastic carriers.

column12: PACKAGING MACHINE AND POWER TRANSMISSION DEVICE
column13: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To package containers of different forms by a plastic carrier by supporting a shaft of a first power transmission device by a self-aligning bearing and by supporting a shaft of a second power transmission device by a bearing attached to a frame of the device and a frame of a conveyer on its upper and lower portions. SOLUTION: A plastic carrier 9 fed from a reel 8 passes through a carrier roll 10 to reach a feed trough, and after a carrier side rim is folded, it is mounted on a rotary plate 11. On the other hand, containers collected as a package by the carrier 9 ate transferred along a guide 4 by a conveyer 35. A driving device including an electric motor and a decelerator is provided to drive such a device, and a shaft 29 of a first power transmission device is rotated by its power. The shaft 29 is supported by a self-aligning bearing and extends across a lower part of the conveyer 35 to an opposite side for transmitting power to a vertically extending shaft 20 of a second power transmission device.
column15: CERVANTES FRANCISCO;;MIGUEL-DIAZ LUIS

column12: LOW SPEED CONTAINER PACKAGE FORMING MACHINE
column13: A LOW SPEED CONTAINER PACKAGING MACHINE FOR APPLYING PLASTIC CARRIERS (9) TO CONTAINERS (42) TO HOLD THEM IN PACKAGES COMPRISES, A CONVEYOR (5) MOVING CONTAINERS (42) IN DOUBLE ROWS AND INTRODUCES THEM TO THE CARRIER APPLYING SECTION, AND A COUPLE OF STARWHEELS (12) TO LOCATE THEM IN SYNCHRONOUS POSITIONS BELOW JAW PLATES (11) WHICH APPLY THE CARRIER STOCK (9) TO THEM. THE JAWS (15) ARE MOUNTED ON THE PLATES (11) WHICH SPIN ON TWO AXIS AT PRESET ANGLES WITH RESPECT TO THE HORIZONTAL AND VERTICAL PLANES AND WHICH ARE LOCATEDSYMMETRICALLY WITH RESPECT TO THE LONGITUDINAL AXIS OF THE MACHINE. THE PLATES, UPON SPINNING TAKE THE CARRIER STRIP (9) FROM A FEEDTHROUGH (13) AND WITH THEIR JAWS (15), STRETCH THEM THE CARRIER SO THAT IT FITS OVER THE END OF THE CONTAINERS (42). A CENTRALLY POSITIONED RELEASE PLATE (19) REMOVES THE CARRIER STOCK (9) FROM THE JAW PLATES (11) AND, DEPOSITS IT ON THE CONTAINERS (42). ONCE THE CARRIER (9) IS APPLIED TO THE CONTAINERS (42), THESE ENTER A CUTTING STATION IN WHICH PACKAGES OF 2, 4, 6, 8 OR MORE CONTAINERS ARE FORMED BY MEANS OF A CUTTING SYSTEM WHICH CUTS THE CARRIER STOCK (9). (FIGURE 5)
column15: FRANCISCO-CERVANTES;;MIGUEL-DIAZ LUIS

column12: MICROWAVE FILTER WITH DOUBLE PASSBAND AND HIGH SELECTIVITY.
column13: The present invention relates to a filter passband microwave based on CLRH type metamaterial lines, the equivalent electrical circuit of the filter, as well as its design methodology. The said circuit is validated by presenting the design of an example of a double band filter with passbands in 2.4 GHz and 5.8 GHz, resulting in insertion losses close to zero and return losses higher than -10dB, within a bandwidth fractional of up 24.45% to 12% for the first and second passband. The filter has good selectivity, checked due to the presence of two transmission zeros of 2,059 GHz, 2,761 GHz, 5,386 GHz, and 6,215 GHz.
column14: INSTITUTO NAC DE ASTROFISICA OPTICA Y ELECTRONICA
column15: ALONSO CORONA CHÁVEZ;;JOSÉ LUIS OLVERA CERVANTES

column12: MICROWAVE PLANAR DIFFERENTIAL FILTERS OF REDUCED SIZE APPLIED IN HIGH-SPEED CIRCUITS.
column13: A band pass filter of microwaves based on close loop resonators with short-circuiting stub. The filter has a reduced size and is free of spurious frequency in up to 5.6 times the central frequency in differential mode. In addition, the use of close-loop resonators with short-circuiting stub allows the circuit to be miniaturized with regard to the conventional filters.
column14: INSTITUTO NAC DE ASTROFÍSICA ÓPTICA Y ELECTRÓNICA
column15: ALONSO CORONA CHAVEZ;;JOSE LUIS OLVERA CERVANTES

column12: DOUBLE BAND MICROWAVE FILTER WITH INDEPENDENT PASS BANDS.
column13: Described is a pass band filter of double microwave band based on resonant links of double band and resonators of half wavelength. The resonant links are formed by a short-circuiting resonator of 1/4 wavelength of the central frequency of the first pass band and a resonator of 1/2 wavelength of the central frequency of the second pass band. The first pass band is formed by coupling a resonant link to the input with two resonators of ½ wavelength of the central frequency of the first pass band and a dual resonant link to the output. The second pass band is formed by coupling the input dual resonant link with a resonator of ½ wavelength of the central frequency of the second pass band and the dual resonant link of the output.
column14: INST NAC DE ASTROFÍSICA ÓPTICA Y ELECTRÓNICA
column15: ALONSO CORONA CHAVEZ;;JOSE LUIS OLVERA CERVANTES

column12: Advertising support (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Advertising support for staffs, which being designed to contain advertising panels intended for the promotion of events of any kind and intended to be fixed on the staff or column of a streetlamp, traffic light or similar, is characterized because it is constituted by two parts or housings hinged together through one of their edges, a means of closing between them being established on the opposite edge, said said convex configuration housings to define an elongated and narrow elliptical contour, in which centrally and longitudinally an orifice is established. Circular section of adaptation to the corresponding staff, carrying out the fixing on it by a pair of clamps, one upper and one lower, with the particularity that each casing has a gate in which there is a positioning tab for the respective advertising panel . column12: DIFFERENTIAL MICROWAVE FILTERS WITH QUARTER-WAVE RESONATORS.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a microwave band-pass differential filter based on quarter-wave resonators and 180° phase-shifters. The differential filter is made of micro-strip, operating at frequencies that can oscillate between 100MHz and 300GHz. The filter generates a band-pass in differential mode because a virtual open circuit is generated along the symmetry line passing through the resonators, which excites the resonance frequency of the same. On the other hand, when the filter is fed in common mode, a virtual short circuit is generated in the symmetry line blocking the signals in common mode. This allows increasing the spurious free band in common mode up to a frequency 10 times higher than the central frequency in differential mode.

column12: IMMEDIATE RELEASE FORMULATION OF A TRIPLE COMBINATION OF ACTIVE PHARMACEUTICAL INGREDIENTS USEFUL IN THE TREATMENT OF POLYCYSTIC OVARY SYNDROME
column13: Immediate release formulation of a triple combination of active pharmaceutical ingredients useful in the treatment of polycystic ovarysyndrome It relates to an immediate release formulation for oral administration, comprising; a) a combination of three active pharmaceutical ingredients which are spironolactone; pioglitazone or a salt thereof; and metformin or a salt thereof; and b) solid polyethylene glycol having an average molecular weight from 3350 to 8000 g/mol; wherein: each of the active pharmaceutical ingredients are present in a therapeutically effective amount; and the polyethylene glycol is present in an amount such that decreases the dissolution profiles in vitro of each one of the active pharmaceutical ingredients without modifying the disintegration time of the formulation compared with the dissolution profiles of each one of the active pharmaceutical ingredients of a formulation having the same composition but without the solid polyethylene glycol, as well as, to its preparation process.

column12: DOUBLE-BAND DIFFERENTIAL MICROWAVE FILTER.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a double-band differential microwave filter based on resonators and a plurality of 180° phase shifters. The differential dual band filter is based on micro-tape, operating at frequencies oscillating between 100MHz and 300GHz. The filter generates two pass bands in differential mode because a virtual open circuit is generated along the symmetry line that passes through the coupling rings, coupling electromagnetic energy to the resonators. On the other hand, when the filter is fed in common mode, a virtual short circuit is generated on the symmetry line of the coupling ring, attenuating the signals in common mode. When using coupling rings, the two pass bands can be designed independently in terms of the type of resonators used, type of response configuration and number of resonators.

column12: 다낭성 난소 증후군 치료에 유용한 활성 약학적 성분들의 삼중 조합의 즉시 방출 제제
column13: 다낭성 난소 증후군 치료에 유용한 활성 약학적 성분들의 삼중 조합의 즉시 방출 제제. 본 발명은 경구 투여용 즉시 방출 제제 및 이의 제조 방법에 관한 것으로서, a) 스피로노락톤; 피오글리타존 또는 이의 염; 및 메트포르민 또는 이의 염인 3가지 활성 약학적 성분들의 조합; 및 b) 평균 분자량이 3350 내지 8000 g/mol인 고체 폴리에틸렌 글리콜을 포함하고, 상기 각 활성 약학적 성분들은 치료적으로 유효한 양으로 존재하고; 상기 폴리에틸렌 글리콜은 동일한 조성을 갖지만 고체 폴리에틸렌 글리콜은 갖지 않는 제제의 활성 약학적 성분들의 각 하나의 성분의 용출 프로파일에 비해, 상기 제제의 붕해 시간을 변경하지 않고 상기 활성 약학적 성분들의 각 하나의 성분의 인 비트로 용출 프로파일을 감소시키는 양으로 존재한다.

column12: FREQUENCY-SELECTIVE SURFACE BASED ON WATER RESONATORS.
column13: The present invention relates to a frequency-selective surface with at least four dielectric resonators forming a symmetric and periodic arrangement in two dimensions, characterized by consisting of water with cylindrical inlays of a dielectric material with a permittivity less than that of water and a tangent loss less than 0.01 to increase the quality factor of the structure. The frequency-selective surface allows operating in a low pass configuration at frequencies ranging from 100MHz to 300GHz with an effective permittivity higher than 10 to excite transverse electric (TE) or hybrid electric magnetic (HEM) modes.

column12: MINI MACHINE FOR SHREDDING ALUMINUM CANS.
column13: The present invention refers to a mobile mini machine for shredding aluminum cans, with the purpose of improving the efficiency of the process for recycling or recovering the aluminum cans; avoiding explosion risks during the fusion process due to the humidity stored in the inner portion of the can or due to any other strange object, also reducing the decrease presented during the fusion process. Compacting and shredding the aluminum can in a simultaneous manner represents a technical issue, the machine solving the volume problem during the storage; which economically abates the transportation costs and reduces the growth of harmful fauna. It is considered that crushing a can is an easy task, remaining the can half compacted; but when the volume of cans required to produce a ton of aluminum is of 76000 pieces, it would represent a serious problem, it is worthy to mention that the aluminum can is of high purity. The machine is small and mobile, easily operated and safe, working with a current of 110 volts, shredding and compacting a ton of aluminum cans in 8 hours.

column12: ARRANGEMENT OF FLAT DUAL-BAND ANTENNAS WITH COMMON AND DIFFERENTIAL MODES.
column13: The present invention relates to a dual-band planar antenna array with common and differential modes, consisting of four rectangular patch antennas, a 180° hybrid coupler, and a capacitor. When it motorizes by the differential port of the hybrid coupler, it generates a virtual electrical wall along the line of symmetry, avoiding an effect on the capacitor. Also, when it motorizes by the common one, it generates a virtual magnetic panel, changing its resonance frequency and obtaining two operating bands. Further, it aims to have a radiation pattern perpendicular to the antenna array with similar gain in both modes.

column12: MICROWAVE FILTER BASED ON METAL-DIELECTRIC TUNNELS WITH AN EFFECTIVE PERMITTIVITY CLOSE TO ZERO.
column13: Microwave filter based on metal-dielectric tunnels with an effective permittivity close to zero. The use of this type of tunnels allows a circuit to be miniaturized, unlike traditional filters. The filter may have two or more tunnels interconnected therebetween with transmission lines, where the inlet and outlet ports are arranged in micro-tape supplying lines.

column12: SENSOR WITH PERMITTIVITY CLOSE TO ZERO RECONFIGURABLE FOR DIELECTRIC PROPERTIES.
column13: The present invention relates to a reconfigurable sensor for dielectric properties based on a tunnel with effective permittivity close to zero. Said tunnel possesses a central hole to place dielectric samples and symmetrical holes to insert or remove by metal pole actuators, thereby performing measurements at different operating frequencies. Also, it is operated in electromagnetic propagation mode TE10 and the properties of the samples are extracted with the cavity disturbance method. Further, the sensor can operate in a frequency range of up 100MHz to 300GHz.

column12: PREPARATION OF PSITTACANTHUS CALYCULATUS WITH ANTI-HYPERTENSIVE PROPERTIES, METHODS FOR THE PRODUCTION AND USE THEREOF.
column13: The present invention is related to vegetable extracts for treating hypertension, and mainly referring to a semi-pure hydro-soluble extract from American mistletoe Psittacanthus calyculatus, which is formed by molecules higher than 1000 daltons, adsorbed in activated carbon and thermostable. Provided is the method for the production thereof and the evidence that this preparation with vasorelaxant properties has no cytotoxic and cardiopathic effects and therefore may be used for preparing compositions for treating hypertension in mammals.

column12: BALANCED MICROWAVE FILTER WITH LIQUID METAL RECONFIGURATION.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a balanced microwave filter with liquid metal reconfiguration in micro-tapes technology. The filter suppresses common mode signals and in differential mode it can be reconfigured in two pass bands. The reconfiguration method is by means of a liquid metal switch that allows two states. In the first connection state, the first passband is activated. In the second connection state, the second passband is activated. This filter has applications in microwave systems operating at frequencies that can oscillate between 100MHz and 300GHz. The advantage of the present invention is that liquid metal switches are used to reconfigure the filter, eliminating the non-linearities and power limitations of solid-state switches.
column14: INSTITUTO NAC DE ASTROFISICA OPTICA Y ELECTRONICA

column12: Vehicle auxiliary battery charging system
column13: An auxiliary battery charging system comprising a monitoring controller 520 configured to operate with a display device 522 to display and auxiliary battery voltage, operate with a charger 502 to start charging when the battery voltage falls below a lower limit or lower threshold, and stop charging when the battery voltage reaches an optimum value such as an upper limit. The battery charging system may be used for an auxiliary battery system within a vehicle or automobile. The battery charging system may comprise a plurality of sensors 512 such as a voltage sensor 514 or temperature sensor 516. The controller may disable the charger after a set time period. The controller may turn off the charger if the temperature reading is outside of a set range.

column12: SENSOR AND METHOD FOR MEASURING UNIAXIAL ANISOTROPY USING COUPLED RESONATORS.
column13: The present invention relates to a sensor and method for measuring the uniaxial dielectric constant tensor in dielectric samples tested using coupled resonators. The said sensor consists of two coupled resonators, an input and an output power network developed in micro strip technology. Also, it operates in frequencies ranging from RF to millimeter waves, allowing testing of the anisotropy of samples of dielectric materials. The method uses the response of coupled resonators by relating the odd and even resonance frequencies to the components of the uniaxial dielectric constant tensor that a sample under test exhibits.

column12: CORROSION INHIBITOR DERIVED FROM VEGETABLE OILS AND ITS PRODUCTION PROCESS.
column13: The present invention is directed to a formulation of corrosion inhibitors for corrosion control of low carbon steel piping, carrying different fuels products, obtained in refineries or petrochemical processes. The composition comprises active imidazoline inhibitors derived from vegetable oil selected from the group consisting of sunflower, canola, soybean, safflower, corn and mixtures thereof that are reacted with a polyalkylated polyamines such as diethylenetriamines (DETA), triethylenetetramine (TETA) and tetraethylenepentamine (TEPA). The imidazoline is reacted with 1 to 3 moles of a carboxylic acid having 2 to 6 carbon atoms. The product obtained is formulated with 50 to 60% weight of an aromatic solvent and 10 to 20 wt % of an alcohol. The compositions were evaluated in sour environments under the NACE TM0172 and ASTM G 185 method, and both, sour and sweet environments in the NACE ID182 method, so they are fit to pass the tests as indicated by the NRF-005-PEMEX-2009 standard for application in pipelines.

column12: RECONFIGURABLE BALANCED MICROWAVE FILTER.
column13: The present invention relates to reconfigurable balanced bandpass filters in the microwave frequency range. It consists of two flat ports and N reconfigurable balanced resonators, where N takes values ??higher than one, transmitting in differential and standard modes. Said filter reconfigures by high-frequency switches located in the middle of the LM conductors with varactor diodes, SMEM, liquid crystal, liquids with a high dielectric constant, or liquid metal (preferred mode). The common mode rejection presented by the filter is better than -30 dB from 0.5 GHz to 5.3 GHz. The advantage of the filter is that you can propose values ??for the impedance and electrical length of the LTs, values ??for the inductors LE and ranges of operating frequency in differential mode and standard mode, and obtain values ??for the LM inductors.

column12: Method of inhibiting corrosion using a corrosion inhibitor derived from vegetable oils
column13: The present invention is directed to a formulation of corrosion inhibitors for corrosion control of low carbon steel piping, carrying different fuels products, obtained in refineries or petrochemical processes. The composition comprises active imidazoline inhibitors derived from vegetable oil selected from the group consisting of sunflower, canola, soybean, safflower, corn and mixtures thereof that are reacted with a polyalkylated polyamines such as diethylenetriamines (DETA), triethylenetetramine (TETA) and tetraethylenepentamine (TEPA). The imidazoline is reacted with 1 to 3 moles of a carboxylic acid having 2 to 6 carbon atoms. The product obtained is formulated with 50 to 60% weight of an aromatic solvent and 10 to 20 wt % of an alcohol. The compositions were evaluated in sour environments under the NACE TM0172 and ASTM G 185 method, and both, sour and sweet environments in the NACE ID182 method, so they are fit to pass the tests as indicated by the NRF-005-PEMEX-2009 standard for application in pipelines.
column15: BENITEZ AGUILAR JOSE LUIS RODOLFO;;TOBON CERVANTES AMALIA;;ESTRADA MARTINEZ ARQUIMEDES;;NAVARRO ORDONEZ NANCY

column12: METHOD FOR CRYSTALLIZING AQUEOUS SUBSTANCES CONTAINING CARBOHYDRATES AND CRYSTALLIZED PRODUCTS OBTAINED.
column13: The present invention relates to a method for crystallizing aqueous carbohydrate substances, consisting of purifying the aqueous carbohydrate-containing substance, mixing it with a water-absorbent medium, distributing the said mixture in a container resistant to high temperatures, heating it in a microwave, cooling it, reheating and cooling until reaching a humidity of up 2% to 4%, pulverizing the crystallized layer-mixture, removing the water-absorbing medium from the crystals obtained, and recovering said crystals, thus obtaining a crystallized or granulated product.

column12: , "COMPOSICION CATALITICA MEJORADA PARA LA OXIDACION DE CONTAMINANTES DE GASES DE ESCAPE DE MOTORES A GASOLINA
column13: La presente invención se refiere a una composición catalítica mejorada para la oxidación de contaminantes de gases de escape de motores a gasolina, caracterizada porque comprende de 1 a 3 por ciento peso, con respecto al soporte, de un metal de transición del grupo VB, tal como el vanadio; de 2 a 5 por ciento peso, con respecto al peso del soporte, de un metal de transisión del grupo IB, tal como el cobre; un metal de transición del grupo VIIIb, tal como el níquel, en concentraciones comprendidas entre 1 y 3 por ciento peso con respecto al epso del soporte, el cual puede ser alúmina, sílice, diatomita, bentonita, o zeolita, y se encuentra presente en una proporción de 90 a 95 por ciento en peso con respecto al peso total de la composición.

column12: CORROSION INHIBITOR DERIVED FROM SUNFLOWER OIL.

column12: METHOD FOR CRYSTALLISING AQUEOUS CARBOHYDRATE-CONTAINING SUBSTANCES AND CRYSTALLIZED PRODUCT OBTAINED
column13: A method for crystallising aqueous carbohydrate-containing substances which comprises: purifying the aqueous carbohydrate-containing substance; mixing said aqueous substance with a water-absorbing medium; distributing said mixture in a layer on a receptacle resistant to high temperatures; heating the layer of the mixture from the previous step in a microwave apparatus; cooling the layer of the mixture; reheating and cooling the layer of the mixture until it reaches a humidity of 2-4%; spraying the crystallised layer-mixture; removing the water-absorbing medium from the crystals obtained; and recovering said crystals. A crystallised or granular product obtained by said crystallisation method.

column12: TUNABLE BAND-PASS FILTER BASED ON FERROMAGNETIC RESONANCE.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a tunable band-pass filter based on ferromagnetic resonance grounded on a hybrid coupler of 3dB and 90° to which the same are connected, between their direct and coupled terminals, a band-stop filter based on ferrimagnetic materials. Ferrimagnetic materials are irradiated by an external magnetic field in such a way that its ferromagnetic resonance is excited, thus achieving a pass-band response between the input and isolated terminals of the hybrid coupler. The external magnetic field can be varied, with which the ferromagnetic resonance frequency can be tuned, thus achieving several band-pass at different frequencies.

column12: VEHICLE AUXILIARY BATTERY CHARGING SYSTEM.
column13: Various embodiments of the present disclosure provide an auxiliary battery charging system for monitoring and regulating the energy flow to an auxiliary battery in a vehicle. More specifically, the auxiliary battery charging system of the present disclosure includes a monitoring controller configured to operate with a plurality of sensors, a display device and a battery charger to display the battery status (such as temperature, voltage, time of last charge); initiate charging of the auxiliary battery when the auxiliary battery voltage reaches a predetermined minimum voltage; and disable the charging process when the auxiliary battery voltage has reached an optimum level.

column12: FAHRZEUG-ZUSATZBATTERIELADESYSTEM
column13: Diverse Ausführungsformen der vorliegenden Offenbarung stellen ein Zusatzbatterieladesystem zum Überwachen und Regulieren des Energieflusses zu einer Zusatzbatterie in einem Fahrzeug bereit. Genauer genommen weist das Zusatzbatterieladesystem der vorliegenden Offenbarung eine Überwachungssteuervorrichtung auf, die konfiguriert ist, um mit einer Mehrzahl von Sensoren, einer Displayvorrichtung und einem Batterieauflader zu arbeiten, um die Batteriezustände (wie zum Beispiel Temperatur, Spannung, Zeit der letzten Ladung) anzuzeigen, das Laden der Zusatzbatterie zu initiieren, wenn die Zusatzbatteriespannung eine vorbestimmte Mindestspannung erreicht, und den Ladeprozess zu deaktivieren, wenn die Zusatzbatteriespannung einen optimalen Pegel erreicht hat.

column12: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MEASURING DYNAMIC VISCOSITY IN A LIQUID USING A RIBBON OR MICRO-RIBBON PROBE.
column13: The present invention relates to a system and a method for measuring the dynamic viscosity of fluids from their real permittivity using a coaxial probe in the microwave range of up 100MHz to 300GHz, a network analyzer, a container for a sample, and a central processing unit, correlating it first. Once this correlation is obtained, the real permittivity and the dynamic viscosity are plotted, obtaining the trend equation using a curve fitting method. The trend equation allows obtaining the dynamic viscosity of any fluid sample unknown by the value of its real permittivity.

column13: The present invention relates to a process for obtaining Agave Lechuguilla leaf fibers and all species of the Agave genus with high strength and quality equal or better to the process of manual fiber carving. Herein, is considered the process for obtaining a fiber by an enzymatic process, where the first stage is the pretreatment of the sample, the second the depectinization and elimination of the cutin, and the third the drying process. The fibers of the present invention are useful for textile application, rugs, brushes, ropes, rugs, sacks, as well as an industrial fiber.

column12: AUTOMATIC VEHICLE VENTILATION AND TEMPERATURE REGULATION SYSTEM
column13: A system for ventilating a vehicle cabin includes a powered vent, such as a window or sunroof, for opening and closing to selectively ventilate the vehicle cabin. A controller may be provided for: (1) opening the powered vent based on a pre-determined opening time; (2) controlling the powered vent to activate based on a pre-determined parking location; and/or (3) controlling the powered vent to activate based on a sunlight intensity.

column12: NOVEL COMPOSITION AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING SILAGE FROM FOOD ORGANIC WASTES.
column13: The present invention refers to a novel composition and process for manufacturing silage from food organic wastes by a silage process consisting in: a) selecting the organic matter; b) milling or chopping the materials; c) adding an activating mixture; d) adding, in an non limitative manner, one or more sources or carbohydrates and/or lipids and/or proteins and/or enzymes; e) homogenising materials; f) packing the final product and g) storing the same. The silage obtained by this novel process maintains the quality and nutritional properties, also improving the digestibility if it is stored under the conditions described in the present invention, and may be preserved for up to twelve months maintaining its characteristics and harmlessness. The application of the inventive silage is in the diet of bovines, pigs, sheep, goat, horses and poultry, fish, pet or animals in captivity, this being a product obtained by an affordable, easy and sustainable process.

column12: Light-emitting silk fiber for light (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
column13: Light-emitting silk fiber for light. The present invention develops a biocompatible and biodegradable device for emitting light that acts on animal cells and tissues with biological and therapeutic effects. The fundamental element of the device consists of a fiber of silk fibroin, with a diameter between 0.1 and 1.0 mm and variable length, obtained from the sericigenic gland of the silkworm. This fiber is traditionally known as hijuela and was historically used as a suture and fishing line. When the hijuela is illuminated by one end with conventional light or laser, it emits light laterally along several centimeters. This fiber can be implanted in human tissues without needing to be removed, due to its biocompatible and biodegradable character. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

column12: METHOD AND MINIATURIZED HELICAL ANTENNA WITH PRINTED PROPELLERS BASED ON LINES IN THE FORM OF MEANDERS.
column13: The present invention relates to a method and a novel miniaturized helical antenna with meander-shaped printed propellers based on the miniaturization of its apparent cross section and whose operating frequency ranges from 100MHz to 300GHz. The antenna is small in size and consists of two levers made of dielectric material on which lie strips of conductive material in the shape of a meander. Both plates are separated by a dielectric layer and interconnected by copper wires called via-hole. Also, it has a coaxial connector for its power supply, a metallic disk-shaped reflector, and a coupling network formed by two perpendicular lines to couple the propellers and the coaxial connector.

column12: Multifunctional composition base 1,3-oxazinan-6-ones with corrosion inhibition and heavy organic compounds inhibition and dispersants and obtaining process
column13: Base compounds including 1,3-oxazinan-6-one derivatives of N-alkyl or N-alkenyl or N-cycloalkyl or N-aryl propionic acids and paraformaldehyde, and their application as corrosion inhibitors with multifunctional properties serving as inhibitory/dispersant of asphaltene in production processes, transportation, refining and storage of crude oil and derivatives. The corrosion inhibitor with inhibitory/dispersant of asphaltenes properties comprises an active substance base of 1,3-oxaninan-6-ones and hydrocarbon solvents such as benzene, toluene, mixed xylenes, o-xylene, m-xylene and p -xylene, diesel, kerosene, jet fuel, alcohols, aliphatic branched and unbranched alcohols containing from 3 to 10 carbon atoms, such as isopropanol, butanol and pentanol, and mixtures of hydrocarbon solvents with aliphatic branched or unbranched liquid fuels. In addition, a process for obtaining 1,3-oxazinan-6-ones derivatives of N-alkyl or N-alkenyl or N-cycloalkyl or N-aryl propionic acids and paraformaldehyde is described.

The corrosion inhibitor with inhibitory/dispersant of asphaltenes properties comprises an active substance base of 1,3-oxaninan-6-ones and hydrocarbon solvents such as benzene, toluene, mixed xylenes, o-xylene, m-xylene and p-xylene, diesel, kerosene, jet fuel, alcohols, aliphatic branched and unbranched alcohols containing from 3 to 10 carbon atoms, such as isopropanol, butanol and pentanol, and mixtures of hydrocarbon solvents with aliphatic branched or unbranched liquid fuels. In addition, a process for obtaining 1,3-oxazinan-6-ones derivatives of N-alkyl or N-alkenyl or N-cycloalkyl or N-aryl propionic acids and paraformaldehyde is described.

column12: SILK FIBRE WITH LATERAL LIGHT EMISSION
column13: The invention relates to a biocompatible and biodegradable device for emitting light, which acts on animal cells and tissues with biological and therapeutic effects. The fundamental element of the device consists in a silk fibroin fibre with a diameter of between 0.1 and 1.0 mm and a variable length, obtained from the silk gland of the silk worm. This fibre is traditionally known as silk filament and was historically used as suture and fishing lines. When the silk filament is illuminated on one end with conventional or laser light, it emits light laterally along various centimetres. This fibre can be implanted in human tissue without needing to to be removed, as a result of the biocompatible and biodegradable character thereof.

column12: MODULAR SYSTEM FOR RECTIFYING OR SEPARATING SOLUBLE COMPONENTS IN SOLUTION THROUGH THE FORMATION OF FOAM.
column13: The present invention relates to a modular system for rectifying or separating soluble components in solution by foam formation. Said system consists of a first module that contains a thermal control liquid or temperature control bath for injecting a working gas. Said a first pipe connects the first module to a second module saturating said gas using the same solvent of the solution that contains the separated soluble components. Also, the second module connects the second pipe to a third module forming the foam. The third module interconnects to a fourth module, generating the foam and originating from rectification. The fourth module connects the tube to a fifth module, lowering the foam's temperature and increasing the surface tension, causing its collapse. Said fifth module connects the third pipe to a sixth module collapsing said foam, and liquid, enriched by the material(s) removed. The fifth module connects the fourth pipe to a sixth module regulating the counter pressure durin g operation, adjusted by the liquid level used for gas washing.

column12: VEHICLE FOOT PEDAL STOWAGE AND CONCEALMENT SYSTEM
column13: A footwell assembly for a vehicle is disclosed herein. The footwell assembly includes a receiving member that defines a recess configured to receive a stowed foot pedal. A cover feature includes a connecting member that is removably coupled to the receiving member and a cover member that is coupled to the connecting member. The cover member is operable to move relative to the connecting member from a first position to a second concealment position to cover the stowed foot pedal.

column12: PROCEDIMIENTO PARA LA OBTENCION DE UNA ZEOLITA ESTEREOSELECTIVA DE PORO GRANDE.
column13: La presente invención describe un procedimiento para preparar una zeolita cristalina y particularmente describe un método para obtener una zeolita estereoselectiva de poro grande. El procedimiento objeto de la presente invención se caracteriza porque la reacción se lleva a cabo en condiciones hidrotérmicas, con una fuente de silicio y aluminio, en presencia de una sal cuaternaria de amonio y un hidróxido de metal alcalino tal como sodio o potasio para mantener un pH altamente alcalino y favorecer la cristalización de la zeolita.
column15: HERNANDEZ RAFAELA HERNANDEZ;;HERNANDEZ LUIS ABEL GOMEZ;;CASTILLO M DE LOURDES A GUZMAN;;CERVANTES AMALIA TOBON;;SECORA ISAAC SCHIFTER

column12: SYSTEM ZUR VERSTAUUNG UND VERDECKUNG VON FUSSPEDALEN IN FAHRZEUGEN
column13: Diese Offenbarung stellt ein System zur Verstauung und Verdeckung von Fußpedalen in Fahrzeugen bereit. In dieser Schrift wird eine Fußraumbaugruppe für ein Fahrzeug offenbart. Die Fußraumbaugruppe beinhaltet ein Aufnahmeelement, das eine Aussparung definiert, die dazu konfiguriert ist, ein verstautes Fußpedal aufzunehmen. Ein Abdeckungsmerkmal beinhaltet ein Verbindungselement, das entfernbar an das Aufnahmeelement gekoppelt ist, und ein Abdeckungselement, das an das Verbindungselement gekoppelt ist. Das Abdeckungselement kann so betätigt werden, dass es sich relativ zu dem Verbindungselement aus einer ersten Position in eine zweite Verdeckungsposition bewegt, um das verstaute Fußpedal abzudecken.

column12: POLYMERIC PRESSURE SENSORS MADE OF POLYDIMETHYLSILOXANE.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a diaphragm made of polymeric materials of the electronic, semiconductors and microfluidic industry for applications in pressure sensors. The diaphragm of the present invention is is made out of a polymeric material and comprises piezoresistors also being made out of a polymeric material whose electromechanical characteristics allow transducing the deformation caused by the pressure on the diaphragm to an electrical signal as an indication of the pressure applied to the diaphragm. Furthermore, a polymeric piezoelectric material can be used as a transduction means being applied as an extra layer over the first diaphragm. Said diaphragm can be of different geometric shapes according to the application and manufacturing process. The dimensions of the diaphragm and piezoresistors, the thickness of the piezoelectric and structural layers and the geometry of the structure, will be determined by the application and pressure range to which the device is su bjected.
column15: CERVANTES JACOBO ESTEBAN MUNGUÍA;;ARCE MIGUEL ÁNGEL ALEMÁN;;ACEVEDO SALVADOR MENDOZA;;VARGAS LUIS ALFONSO VILLA;;SALINAS MARCO ANTONIO RAMÍREZ

column12: IMPLANTABLE POLYMERIC INFUSION PUMP FOR SUPPLYING DRUGS IN TREATMENTS OF LIVER METASTASES.
column13: The present invention refers to a polydimethylsiloxane implantable integrated system for supplying drugs in treatments of liver metastases by infusion. The system consists in a propelling chamber that contains gas, which exerts a pressure over the membrane, the induced pressure causing a deformation in the membrane, which modifies the volume of the deposit chamber that contains the drug to be supplied. The thickness and size of the membrane will be determined by the pressure exerted by the propelling gas. The invention also includes a micro channel used as a regulator system for supplying the drug in a controlled manner. The size of the micro channel will depend on the flow of the drug that is desired to be administered to the patient.
column15: JACOBO ESTEBAN MUNGUÍA CERVANTES;;SALVADOR MENDOZA ACEVEDO;;LUIS ALFONSO VILLA VARGAS;;MARCO ANTONIO RAMÍREZ SALINAS;;MIGUEL ANGEL ALEMÁN ARCE

column12: CORROSION INHIBITOR FOR POLIDUCTS OF LOW-CARBON STEEL, FOR TRANSPORTING DIFFERENT HYDROCARBON FLOWS.
column13: The poliducts of ferrous metal such as API-X52 and SAE 1010 suffer from corrosion caused by chemical compounds found in the different transported flows, such as H2S, CO2, O2, organic acids and soluble salts. These agents may be presented in an individual or combined manner; on the other hand, a single poliduct may be used for transporting different flows of hydrocarbons, such as: gasoline, diesel, MTBE, etc., this may change the corrosive agents; the operation changes of the poliduct may also complicate the problem. The present invention comprises a corrosion inhibitor for poliducts of low-carbon steel, which transport different fuels such as: gasoline, intermediate distillates and oxygenated compounds, these being characteristic products obtained from refineries or petrochemical processes. The composition has a new active based on imidazoline derivatives (glyoxalidines), containing two lateral chains; where the position 2, resulting from a saturated or unsaturated, lineal or branche d carboxylic acid of 6 to 20 carbon atoms, also has one or more alcohols in the hydrocarbonated chain thereof. On the other hand, in the position 1 there is an alkyl-amine of 2 to 4 carbon atoms, simultaneously having three hydrocarbonated linear chains derived from a carboxylic acid of 2 to 5 carbon atoms. The aforementioned molecules are diluted into a dissolvent or mixture thereof, which may be aromatic or alcohols, and acts as a dispersant vehicle reducing their concentration in a significant manner.
column15: MARTÍNEZ ARQUÍMEDES ESTRADA;;CERVANTES AMALIA TOBÓN;;CRUZ JESÚS MARÍN;;AGUILAR JOSÉ LUIS RODOLFO BENÍTEZ;;SANTAMARÍA GABRIELA ESPINOSA;;AKE LUIS MANUEL QUEJ;;MONROY CAROLINA ZURIAGA;;MAGADAN JOSÉ MANUEL MARTÍNEZ

column12: PHTHALOCYANINE BIS AXIALLY SUBSTITUDED BY POLYALKYL OR POLYALKENYL SUCCINIMIDE CARBOXYLATES, PROCESS FOR OBTAINING AND USING THE SAME.
column13: The present invention refers to phthalocyanines or phthalocyanates of tin, silicon and germanium bis axially substituted by polyalkyl or polyalkenyl succinimide carboxylates, with or without peripheral substitution, also referring to the process for obtaining and using the same as dispersing-inhibitor of asphaltenes with tracing properties, mainly in crude oil and byproducts. The phthalocyanines or phthalocyanates of the present invention may be manufactured with organic or hydrocarbon solvents having boiling points within the intervals of 75°C to 300°C. The compounds of the present invention or the formulas thereof are added to crude oil and/or byproducts for preventing and controlling the accumulation of asphaltenes in wells, ducts and refining plants, and due to the trace properties of the compounds, the same are detected through spectroscopic techniques in residual concentrations of up to parts per billion.

column12: CORROSION INHIBITION COMPOSITION FOR PIPELINES, PROCESS OF ELABORATION AND SYNTHESIS
column13: The current invention is related to the synthesis of basic compounds, with the preparation of compositions and its application as corrosion inhibitors for pipelines that transport, besides of crude oil, associated congenital water containing high salt concentrations; the inhibitors are basically constituted by compounds of molecular structure families such as; ionic liquids, imidazoles and benzotriazoles; said formulations can include 2 or more ingredients of each family and use as alcohol solvents, xylene, toluene and mixtures thereof. The inhibitors object of the current invention control the corrosion of metallic surfaces of the pipelines containing congenital water concentrations of 0.2 and 40% by weight, salt concentrations from 10,000 to 70,000 ppm and concentrations of hydrogen sulfide from 9 to 600 ppm, through the synergic effect between 2 or more different families of molecular structures, this synergy is derived from its interactions with the metallic surface, among themselves or with the corrosive medium itself due to its chemical, physical and transportation properties depending on the involved chain length, that improves the corrosion control simultaneously achieving the decrease of the formulation dose. Meanwhile, the ternary formulation use a component of each of the three families or 2 components of the same family and a third component belonging to a second family of molecules. In all cases, the formulations may include solvents as xylene, methanol and toluene, or a mixture of two or three. Application of these compounds and formulations is focused, but not limited to, their use as corrosion inhibitors in typical environments of crude oil transportation and petroleum industry in general.

column12: CORROSION INHIBITION COMPOSITION FOR PIPELINES, PROCESS OF ELABORATION AND SYNTHESIS.
column13: The present invention relates to the synthesis of basic compounds, the preparation of compositions and its application as corrosion inhibitors for pipelines that transport, besides of crude oil, associated congenital water containing high salt concentrations; the inhibitors are basically constituted by compounds of molecular structure families such as: imidazoles, benzotriazoles and ionic liquids; said formulations can include two or more components of each family and can use as alcohol solvents, xylene, toluene or mixtures thereof. The inhibitors object of the present invention control the corrosion of metallic surfaces of the pipelines containing concentrations of congenital water from 0.2 up to 40% by weight, salt concentration between 10,000 and 70,000 ppm and concentration of hydrogen sulfide between 0 and 600 ppm, by means of the synergic effect between two or more components of the same family, or two or more different molecular structure families; this synergy is derived from its interactions with the metallic surface, among themselves or with the corrosive medium itself due to its chemical, physical and transportation properties, based on the length of the involved chain, that improves corrosion control achieving the simultaneous decrease of dosing of formulations. Whereas, the ternary formulations use a component of each one of the three families or two components of the same family and a third component belonging to the second family of molecules. In all cases, the formulations can include solvents as xylene, methanol and toluene, or a mixture of two or three of them. The application of these compounds and formulations is focused, but not limited to its use as corrosion inhibitors in typical transportation environments of crude oil and petroleum industry generally.

column12: CORROSION INHIBITION COMPOSITION FOR PIPELINES, PROCESS OF ELABORATION AND SYNTHESIS
column13: Corrosion inhibitors are provided for pipelines that transport crude oil and/or congenital water containing high salt concentrations, or for metal surfaces in contact with same. The corrosion inhibiting composition is a mixture of at least two different compounds in an organic solvent, providing a synergic effect. Said compounds are selected from the group consisting of imidazoles and benzotriazoles. The mixture of at least two different compounds can also include at least one of each of ionic liquids, imidazoles and benzotriazoles.

column12: CORROSION INHIBITION COMPOSITION FOR PIPELINES, PROCESS OF ELABORATION AND SYNTHESIS
column13: Compounds and compositions are used as corrosion inhibitors for pipelines for crude oil containing water with high salt concentrations. The inhibitors are ionic liquids, imidazoles, benzotriazoles, and mixtures thereof. The composition includes two or more members of the inhibitors with a solvent. The inhibitors reduce corrosion of metallic surfaces of the pipelines containing crude oil having 0.2 and 40 wt % water, 10,000 to 70,000 ppm salt, and 9 to 600 ppm hydrogen sulfide. A synergic effect is provided by two or more different inhibitors. This synergy is derived from interactions with the metallic surface, among themselves or with the corrosive medium depending on the chain length, to inhibit the corrosion with decrease of the formulation dose. The composition can be a ternary formulation of the three families or two components of one family and a third component of a different family.

column12: WATER CONTINUOUS FLOW PROCESSING TRAIN SATURATED OF SOLIDS, GREASES OR OILS, GASES AND SLUDGE DEACTIVATOR.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a set of modules that consist of a hydropneumatic stabilizer system that performs the process of treating water saturated with solids, fats or oils and gases, as well as the deactivation of sludge present in wastewater, originated in industrial processes. Among those that are found, derivatives of oil wells exploration, cleaning processes for the extraction of minerals, discharge waters (sewage) and in general, and any process that involves wastewater contaminated with solid elements, oils or fats, gases and sludge. This process is carried out through a phase separation, filtration and electrolysis system, where the electrolysis process is structured as a capacitor, integrated with a set of dimension plates, according to the water volume to be processed and the voltage to be applied.

column12: A FERROFLUID OF IRON OXIDE NANOPARTICLES COVERED WITH TETRAHYDROXYQUINONE THAT DOES NOT PRODUCE REACTIVE OXYGEN SPECIES.
column13: The present invention relates to a ferrofluid, comprising iron oxide nanoparticles coated with tetrahydroxyquinone of a diameter less than 15 nm, good power absorption when irradiated with alternating magnetic fields, high saturation magnetization, good stability colloidal, suitable for magnetic hyperthermia treatments for cancer, very low cytotoxicity, aiding reducing side effects in a magnetic hyperthermia treatment by not producing reactive oxygen species, avoiding producing oxidation in highly oxidizable media, high potency absorption, and aiding eliminating cancer cells more quickly and effectively by combining the anti-keloid effect of tetrahydroxyquinone and magnetic hyperthermia.

column12: HYDROXYPROPYL BETAINE BASED ZWITTERIONIC GEMINAL LIQUIDS, OBTAINING PROCESS AND USE AS WETTABILITY MODIFIERS WITH INHIBITORY/DISPERSANTS PROPERTIES OF ASPHALTENES
column13: The present invention is related to the obtaining and use of zwitterionic geminal liquids based on hydroxypropyl betaine, as wettability modifiers of rocks such as limestone, dolomite, sandstone, quartz or heterogeneous lithologies, in the presence of brines with high content of divalent ions as calcium, magnesium, barium and strontium, at high temperature and high pressure conditions during the application of enhanced oil recovery processes. The zwitterionic geminal liquids based hydroxypropyl betaine of the present invention have also the property of acting as inhibitors/dispersing of asphaltenes, both at extraction and production operations of petroleum industry, thus allowing to increase the level of crude oil production. An additional advantage presented by zwitterionic geminal liquid based on hydroxypropyl betaine which can be dissolved in distilled water, brine, aliphatic hydrocarbons or other polar and nonpolar solvents.

column12: líquidos zwitteriônicos geminais, processo para a obtenção de líquidos zwitteriônicos geminais, e, método para aumentar a recuperação de óleo em processos de recuperação intensificada de petróleo
column13: líquidos zwitteriônicos geminais, processo para a obtenção de líquidos zwitteriônicos geminais, e, método para aumentar a recuperação intensificada de petróleo a presente invenção refere-se à obtenção e ao uso de líquidos zwitteriônicos geminais com base em hidroxipropil betaína, como modificadores de umectabilidade de rochas, como calcário, dolomita, arenito, quartzo ou litologias heterogêneos, na presença de salmouras com alto teor de íons divalentes como cálcio, magnésio, bário e estrôncio, em condições de alta temperatura e alta pressão, durante a aplicação de processos de recuperação intensificada de petróleo. os líquidos zwitteriônicos geminais à base de hidroxipropil betaína da presente invenção também têm a propriedade de atuar como inibidores/dispersantes de asfaltenos, tanto em operações de extração como de produção da indústria do petróleo, permitindo assim aumentar o nível de produção de petróleo bruto. uma vantagem adicional apresentada pelo líquido zwitteriônico geminal com base em hidroxipropil betaína é que ele pode ser dissolvido em água destilada, salmoura, hidrocarbonetos alifáticos ou outros solventes polares e não polares.
column15: ALEJANDRO RAMÍREZ ESTRADA;;JORGE FRANCISCO RAMÍREZ PÉREZ;;JOSÉ MANUEL MARTÍNEZ MAGADAN;;LUIS SILVESTRE ZAMUDIO RIVERA;;RAÚL HERNÁNDEZ ALTAMIRANO;;RODOLFO CISNEROS DEVORA;;VIOLETA YÁZMIN MENA CERVANTES

column12: AMINO AND IMINO PROPIONIC ACIDS, PROCESS OF PREPARATION AND USE
column13: They were synthesized N-alkyl or N-alkenyl or N-cycloalkyl or N-aryl amino or imino propionic acids with an alkyl chain ranging from 6 to 18 carbons, or alkenyl chain from 8 to 30 carbons, from reaction in absence of solvent in a temperature range from 30 to 180 °C and a time of 1 to 10 hours at atmospheric pressure. Formulations composed of N-alkyl or N-alkenyl or N-cycloalkyl or N-aryl amino or imino propionic acids, polyethers derived from propylene oxide or ethylene oxide or copolymer thereof and a solvent consisting of aromatic compounds such as toluene or xylene, diesel or gasoline or alcohols such as isopropanol and ethanol, or mixtures thereof, which inhibit ferrous metal corrosion of pipelines and storage tanks and transport crude oil and liquid fuels.

column12: HYDROXYPROPYL BETAINE BASED ZWITTERIONIC GEMINAL LIQUIDS, OBTAINING PROCESS AND USE AS WETTABILITY MODIFIERS WITH INHIBITORY/DISPERSANTS PROPERTIES OF ASPHALTENES
column13: The present invention is related to the obtaining and use of zwitterionic geminal liquids based on hydroxypropyl betaine, as wettability modifiers of rocks such as limestone, dolomite, sandstone, quartz or heterogeneous lithologies, in the presence of brines with high content of divalent ions as calcium, magnesium, barium and strontium, at high temperature and high pressure conditions during the application of enhanced oil recovery processes. The zwitterionic geminal liquids based hydroxypropyl betaine of the present invention have also the property of acting as inhibitors/dispersing of asphaltenes, both at extraction and production operations of petroleum industry, thus allowing to increase the level of crude oil production. An additional advantage presented by zwitterionic geminal liquid based on hydroxypropyl betaine which can be dissolved in distilled water, brine, aliphatic hydrocarbons or other polar and nonpolar solvents.

column12: AMINO E IMINO ACIDOS PROPIÓNICOS, PROCESO DE OBTENCIÓN Y USO
column13: Se sintetizaron N-alquil o N-alquenil o N-cicloalquil o N-aril amino o imino ácidos propiónicos con una cadena alquílica que va de 6 a 18 carbonos, o de una cadena alquenílica que va de 8 a 30 carbonos, a partir de una reacción en masa libre de solventes en un intervalo de temperatura que va de 30 a 180°C y un tiempo de 1 a 10 horas a presión atmosférica. Se prepararon formulaciones compuestas de N-alquil o N-alquenil o N-cicloalquil o N-aril amino o imino ácidos propiónicos, poliéteres derivados del óxido de propileno o del óxido de etileno o copolímero de éstos y un solvente constituido de compuestos aromáticos como tolueno o xileno, diesel o gasolina o alcoholes como isopropanol y etanol, o mezclas de éstos, las cuales inhiben la corrosión de metales ferrosos de ductos y tanques que almacenan y transportan aceite crudo y líquidos combustibles.
column15: HERNANDEZ ALTAMIRANO RAUL;;ZAMUDIO RIVERA LUIS SILVESTRE;;MENA CERVANTES VIOLETA YASMIN;;BELTRAN CONDE HIRAM ISAAC;;DOMINGUEZ AGUILAR MARCO ANTONIO;;MARTINEZ VIRAMONTES JAQUELIN;;ESTRADA BUENDIA ARISTEO

column12: Amino and imino propionic acids, process of preparation and use
column13: N-alkyl, N-alkenyl, N-cycloalkyl, N-aryl amino or imino propionic acids with an alkyl chain ranging from 6 to 18 carbons, or alkenyl chain from 8 to 30 carbons, are obtained from a reaction process in the absence of solvent at a temperature range from 30 to 180° C. and a time of 1 to 10 hours at atmospheric pressure. Formulations composed of N-alkyl or N-alkenyl or N-cycloalkyl or N-aryl amino or imino propionic acids, polyethers derived from propylene oxide or ethylene oxide or copolymer thereof and a solvent consisting of aromatic compounds such as toluene or xylene, diesel or gasoline or alcohols such as isopropanol and ethanol, or mixtures thereof, are obtained inhibit ferrous metal corrosion of pipelines and storage tanks and transport crude oil and liquid fuels. A method inhibiting corrosion of ferrous metals adds an effective amount of the corrosion inhibitor to a petroleum based material such as crude oil and liquid fuels such as gasoline, diesel fuel, and aviation fuel.

column12: amino e imino ácidos propiÈnicos, processo de preparação e uso
column13: AMINO E IMINO áCIDOS PROPIÈNICOS, PROCESSO DE PREPARAçãO E USO. O objeto da presente invenção são amino ou imino ácidos propiónicos do tipo N-alquila ou N- alquenila ou N-cicloalquila ou N-aril com uma cadeia de alquila que variam de 6 a 18 carbonos, ou cadeia de alquenila de 8 a 30 carbonos, a partir da reação na ausência de solvente numa temperatura que varia de 30 a 180<198>C e um tempo de 1 a 19 horas em pressão atmosférica. As fórmulações compostas de N-alquila ou N-alquenila ou N-cicloalquila ou N-aril amino ou imino ácidos propiónicos, poliéteres derivados de propileno óxido ou etileno óxido ou copolímero correspondente e um solvente consistindo de compostos aromáticos tais como tolueno ou xileno, diesel ou gasolina ou álcoois, tais como etanol e isopropanol, ou suas misturas, que inibem a corrpsão de metais ferrosos de oleodutos e tanques de armazenamento e transporte de petróleo bruto e combustíveis líquidos.

column12: USE OF ZWITTERIONIC LIQUIDS FOR REMOVING AND INHIBITING THE DAMAGE BY ORGANIC DEPOSITS, IN HYDROCARBON PRODUCTION FORMATIONS.
column13: The present invention is related to the use of zwitterionic liquids, preferably in combination with oxazolidines, as formulations for removing or inhibiting the damage caused by organic deposits, mainly asphaltene, in hydrocarbon producing reservoirs or formations. The molecular characteristics of the zwitterionic liquids of the present invention provide the same with solubility in aqueous and organic systems, therefore the scheme of treatment may be adapted to the particular characteristics of the formation to be treated. Additionally, the novel combination of zwitterionic liquids and additives for inhibiting/dispersing asphaltenes, preferably oxazolidines, provide the resulting formulation with properties for modifying the wettability, inhibiting the adsorption of asphaltenes over the mineral surface of the hydrocarbon producing formation, and properties for dispersing precipitates and organic deposits. The present invention establishes that the formulations based on zwitterionic li quids and the formulations that combine these with oxazolidines, may be applied in treatments of one or two steps: 1. in treatments of a single step, one batch selected from the two classes of formulations can be applied (zwitterionic liquids or zwitterionic liquids along with oxazolidines) into an organic solvent, for achieving a cleaning effect (remediation) and inhibiting the damage originated to the formation by asphaltenes. 2. In the treatments of two steps, the first step consists in the application of a batch of a formulation that combines zwitterionic liquids and oxazolidines in an organic solvent, followed by a second step in which a formulation based on zwitterionic liquids is applied to an organic solvent or in an aqueous solvent, achieving with this an increased cleaning and inhibiting effect of the damage caused by asphaltene deposits.

column12: DIMMABLE HIGH INTENSITY LEDS LUMINAIRE WITH EMERGENCY BALLAST FOR PARKING AREAS.
column13: A high intensity dimmable LEDs luminaire with emergency ballast for car parks for use with fixed or dimmable output comprising a semi-concave shell, characterized in that it has a passage at the center of the skeleton having an inverted "U" shape to accommodate an AC current source, emergency ballast, a set of batteries and electrical harness and in that it has at its concave side ends, a plurality of PCB or MCPBC card and metal heat dissipating elements.

column12: FOAMING COMPOSITION FOR HIGH TEMPERATURE AND SALINITY
column13: The present invention relates to the preparation of foaming formulations for high temperature, salinity and concentration of divalent ions, such as calcium and magnesium ions, that apply the synergistic effect of sodium alpha-olefin sulphonates and alkylamidopropyl betaine; said formulations may use, as solvent, water, seawater, connate water, alcohols or mixtures of all thereof. Said formulations control the piping of gas in deposits of the naturally fractured carbonate type.

column12: METHOD FOR DETERMINING FAILURE CONSEQUENCES IN INDUSTRIAL FACILITIES.
column13: The present disclosure is related to a system and method for determining failure consequences in industrial facilities. The system comprises a memory unit, a data entry unit, a graphical interface, a central processing unit; configured together to execute an algorithm that makes possible the execution of a method for determining failure consequences in industrial facilities, comprising: The main purpose of the present invention is to establish a procedure to determine the associated costs of the possible consequences generated from faults in the components present in industrial facilities. This method is based on a mathematical model with financial focus, considering the impacts associated with an undesired event, allowing the operator to visualize by impact categories in the analyzed components and generate different scenarios to identify the variables that contribute with a higher index of affectation on the installation to be able to implement actions or measures to reduce and/or mitigate hazards. The proposed method considers the structure definition of the model, the relationship of three main impacts: Population, Environment and Business; and of three 20 basic factors: Receiver, Danger and Reduction. The consequence of the installation failure is the sum of the financial exposures by impact type. For a more specific analysis, the result can be obtained determining failure consequences from the component level, up to the installation level in economic terms.

column12: METHOD FOR THE PRODUCTION OF RECOMBINANT ANTIGENS FOR USE AS VACCINES AGAINST CYSTICERCOSIS-TAENIASIS.
column13: The present invention consists in using the recombinant protein expression system in embryogenic cells of papaya for the expression and production of protective recombinant proteins against cysticercosis and taeniasis. Three genetic constructions were performed, wherein the sequences encoding for peptides KETc1, KETc7 and KETc12 from the cysticercus T. crassiceps were independently donated to the expression vector pUl235-5.1. Said constructions were used for transforming, by biobalistics, embryogenic papaya (Carica papaya) callus. The embryogenic callus were co-transformed with each one of the genetic construction in the vector pUl235-5.1 and the vector pWRG1515 which contain the GUS reporter gene that encodes for the (-glucuronidase) enzyme (Christou et al., 1995). The transformed callus were selected and isolated in a selective medium with antibiotics. The ability of expression and immunogenicity of the produced clones were confirmed. Based on the immunogenic ability of the clones, the clones 6p (KETC12.6 His), 9p (KETc1. 6 His) and 23p (KETc7) were selected therefrom, the same being spread, preserved and started the regeneration process in vitro.

column12: BRANCHED GEMINAL ZWITTERIONIC LIQUIDS, METHOD FOR OBTAINING SAME AND USE THEREOF AS WETTABILITY MODIFIERS HAVING VISCOSITY REDUCING PROPERTIES
column13: The invention relates to a method for producing branched geminal zwitterionic liquids based on bis-N,N-dialkyl-N-polyether-betaine or bis-N,N-dialkenyl-N-polyether-betaine or bis-N,N-dicycloalkyl-N-polyether-betaine or bis-N,N-diaryl-N-polyether-betaine, and to the use of same as agents for modifying the wettability of rock, such as limestone, dolomite, sandstone, quartz or heterogeneous lithologies, in the presence of brines having a high concentration of divalent ions, such as calcium, magnesium, barium and strontium, and under high temperature and high pressure conditions, in enhanced oil recovery processes in order to increase oil production. In addition, the branched geminal zwitterionic liquids of the invention can act as viscosity reducing agents for heavy oils with a high concentration of polar fractions, both in extraction and production operations and transport and storage operations, thereby allowing production levels of this type of oil to be increased. An additional advantage of these zwitterionic liquids derives from their molecular structure and the fact that they can be manipulated so as to be soluble in water, hydrocarbon or other polar or non-polar solvents.

column12: Branched geminal zwitterionic liquids, method for obtaining same and use thereof as wettability modifiers having viscosity reducing properties
column13: The present invention is related with the obtaining process and use of branched germinal zwitterionic liquids based on either bis-N,N-dialkyl-N-polyether-betaine or bis-N, N-dialkenyl-N-polyether-betaine or bis-N, N-dicycloalkyl-N-polyether-betaine or bis-N,N-diaryl-N-polyether-betaine, to be applied as modifiers of the wettability of rocks such as limestone, dolomite, sandstone, quartz or heterogeneous lithologies, under the presence of brines having high content of divalent ions such as calcium, magnesium, barium or strontium, under high temperature and high pressure within enhanced oil recovery processes in order to increase the oil production. The branched germinal zwitterionic liquids of the present invention have moreover the property to act as viscosity reducers of heavy oils having high content of polar fractions, both for extraction and production, and transport and storage operations, so allowing increase the production level of this oil type. An additional advantage shown by the zwitterionic liquids, derived from their molecular structure, is that they can be handed in such a manner that can be dissolved by water, hydrocarbon or other polar and non-polar solvents.

column12: LÍQUIDOS ZWITTERIÔNICOS GERMINAIS RAMIFICADOS, PROCESSO PARA OBTENÇÃO DE LÍQUIDOS ZWITTERIÔNICOS GERMINAIS RAMIFICADOS, E, USO DE LÍQUIDOS ZWITTERIÔNICOS GERMINAIS RAMIFICADOS
column13: LÍQUIDOS ZWITTERIÔNICOS GERMINAIS RAMIFICADOS, E, USO DE LÍQUIDOS ZWITTERIÔNICOS GERMINAIS RAMIFICADOS A invenção refere-se a um método para produzir líquidos zwitteriônicos germinais ramificados com base tanto em bis-N,N-dialquil-N-poliéter-betaína quanto em bis-N,N-dialquenil-N-poliéter-betaína ou bis-N,N-dicicloalquil-N-poliéter-betaína ou bis-N,N-diaril-N-poliéter-betaína, e ao uso dos mesmos como agentes para modificar a umectabilidade de rocha, tais como calcário, dolomita, arenito, quartzo ou litologias heterogêneas, na presença de salmouras tendo alta concentração de íons bivalentes, tais como cálcio, magnésio, bário ou estrôncio, e sob condições de alta temperatura e alta pressão, em processos de recuperação de óleo aprimorado de maneira a aumentar a produção de óleo. Em adição, os líquidos zwitteriônicos germinais ramificados da invenção podem atuar como agentes redutores de viscosidade para óleos pesados com uma alta concentração de frações polares, tanto para operações de extração quanto de produção, e operações de transporte e armazenamento, permitindo, assim, que os níveis de produção desse tipo de óleo sejam aumentados. Uma vantagem adicional desses líquidos zwitteriônicos deriva a partir da sua estrutura molecular e o fato que eles podem ser manipulados de modo a serem solúveis em água, hidrocarboneto ou outros solventes polares e não polares.

column12: PIEZORESISTIVE PRESSURE SENSORS BASED ON SOI STRUCTURES WITH MICRO-ETCHED DIAPHRAGMS.
column13: The present invention refers to a diaphragm performed in materials of the electronic industry and semiconductors industry for being applied in pressure sensors. This diaphragm consists in a membrane that includes two or more layers of different materials on which silicon piezoresistors with electromagnetic characteristics are manufactured for allowing the transduction of the deformation to an electric signal susceptible to be manipulated, the deformation being originated by the pressure exerted over the diaphragm. The aforementioned diaphragm may be manufactured in different geometric shapes depending on the application and the manufacturing processes used for manufacturing the same. The invention also has micro-etched channels in the lower surface thereof for increasing the general performance of the diaphragm. The dimensions of the diaphragm, micro-channels and piezoresistors, the thicknesses of the layers and the geometry of the structures will be determined by the application and the pressure range at which the device will be subjected.

column13: The present invention refers to a diaphragm performed in materials of the electronic industry and semiconductors industry for being applied in pressure sensors. This diaphragm consists in a membrane that includes two or more layers of different materials on which silicon piezoresistors with electromagnetic characteristics are manufactured for allowing the transduction of the deformation to an electric signal susceptible to be manipulated, the deformation being originated by the pressure exerted over the diaphragm. The aforementioned diaphragm may be manufactured in different geometric shapes depending on the application and the manufacturing processes used for manufacturing the same. The invention also has micro-etched channels in the lower surface thereof for increasing the general performance of the diaphragm. The dimensions of the diaphragm, micro-channels and piezoresistors, the thicknesses of the layers and the geometry of the structures will be determined by the application and the pressure range at which the device will be subjected.

column12: FOAMING COMPOSITION FOR HIGH TEMPERATURE AND SALINITY.
column13: The present invention refers to the preparation of foaming formulations for supporting high temperatures, salinity and divalent ion concentrations such as calcium and magnesium, which provide the synergic effect of sodium alpha olefin sulfonate and alkyl amido propyl betaine; said formulations may use water, sea-water, and congenital water and alcohols as a solvent, or a mixture thereof. The formulations control the gas supply in naturally fractured wells of the carbonated type.

column12: COMPOSICIÓN ESPUMANTE PARA ALTA TEMPERATURA Y SALINIDAD
column13: La presente invención se relaciona con la preparación de formulaciones espumantes para alta temperatura, salinidad y concentración de iones divalentes como calcio y magnesio, que aplican el efecto sinérgico de alfa olefín sulfonatos de sodio y alquil amido propil betaínas; dichas formulaciones pueden utilizar como solvente agua, agua de mar, agua congénita, alcoholes o mezcla de todos éstos. Estas formulaciones controlan la canalización de gas en yacimientos del tipo carbonatados naturalmente fracturados.

column12: OXAZOLIDINES DERIVED FROM POLYALKYL OR POLYALKYLENE N-HYDROXYALKYL SUCCINIMIDES, METHOD FOR PREPARATION AND USE.
column13: The present invention concerns oxacolidines derived from polyalkyl or polyalkenyl N-hydroxyalkyl succinimides, method for preparation and use to prevent and control formation of deposits in internal combustion machines, principally in formulations of additives which are used in hydrocarbon fuels. The oxacolidines derived from polyalkyl or polyalkenyl N-hydroxyalkyl succinimides of the present invention has the following structural formula (see formula) wherein: R is polyalkyl or polyalkenyl group having an average molecular weight of from about 450 Daltons to about 5000 Daltons; m is a whole number between 1 to 5; n is a whole number between 0 to 1; R1, R2, R3 and R4 are independent radicals represented by the groups: --H, CH2 (CH2)AB, -C6H3DE or ûC10H4FG; wherein: A is a whole number between 0 and 8, B is a group selected from ûH, -NH2, -OH, -COOH, and D, E, F and G are independent radicals selected from the groups: -H, -CH3, -CH2CH3, -CH2CH2CH3, -CH2(CH2)2CH3, -(CH3)3, C6H5, -NH2, - OH, -OCH3, OCH2CH2OH, OCH(CH3)CH2OH, OC6H5 ûCOOH, -SO3.

column12: Korrosionshemmende Zusammensetzung für Pipelines, Gewinnungs- und Syntheseverfahren
column13: Die vorliegende Erfindung bezieht sich auf die Synthese von basischen Verbindungen, der Herstellung von Zusammensetzungen und ihrer Anwendung als Korrosionsinhibitoren für Pipelines, in denen über das Rohöl hinaus auch eingeschlossenes Wasser mit hohen Salzkonzentrationen transportiert wird, wobei die Inhibitoren grundsätzlich aus Verbindungen bestehen, die zu Familien mit den folgenden Molekülstrukturen gehören: Imidazole, Benzotriazole und ionischen Flüssigkeiten; die genannten Formulierungen können zwei oder mehr Bestandteile aus jeder Familie enthalten und als Lösungsmittel Alkohole, Xylen, Toluol oder Mischungen aus all diesen verwenden. Die Inhibitoren, die Gegenstand der vorliegenden Erfindung sind, steuern die Korrosion der Metalloberflächen von Pipelines – mit Konzentrationen an eingeschlossenem Wasser, deren Gewichtsanteil 0,2 bis 40% beträgt, deren Salzkonzentrationen zwischen 10.000 und 70.000 ppm und deren Schwefelwasserstoffkonzentrationen zwischen 0 und 600 ppm betragen – mittels Synergieeffekt zwischen zwei oder mehr Komponenten derselben Familien oder zwei oder mehr Familien mit verschiedenen Molekülstrukturen; diese Synergie ergibt sich aus der Wechselwirkung zwischen der Metalloberfläche mit den Familien und dem korrosivem Mittel aufgrund der chemischen, physischen und Transporteigenschaften in Abhängigkeit von der jeweiligen Kettenlänge; dies verbessert die Steuerung der Korrosion, wodurch gleichzeitig eine Senkung der Dosierung der

column12: Oxazolidines derived from polyalkyl or polyalkenyl n-hydroxyalkyl succinimides, obtainment process and use
column13: Oxazolidines, a process for producing the oxazolidines, and use as additives for fuels to prevent and control deposits in internal combustion engines are disclosed. The oxazolidines are derived from polyalkyl or polyalkenyl N-hydroxyalkyl succinimides and have the structural formula wherein: R is a polyakyl or polyalkenyl group having an average molecular weight ranging from 450 to 5000 daltons;m is an integer between 1 and 5;n is an integer between 0 and 1; andR 1 , R 2 , R 3 , and R 4 are independent radicals, represented by the groups: —H, —CH 2 (CH 2 ) A B, —C 6 H 3 DE or —C 10 H 4 FG; wherein: A is an integer between 0 and 8,B is a group selected among —H, —NH 2 , —OH, —COOH, andD, E, F, and G are independent radicals, selected among the groups: —H, —CH 3 , —CH 2 CH 3 , —CH 2 CH 2 CH 3 , —CH 2 (CH 2 ) 2 CH 3 , —(CH 3 ) 3 , C 6 H 5 , —NH 2 , —OH, —OCH 3 , OCH 2 CH 2 OH, OCH(CH 3 )CH 2 OH, OC 6 H 5 —COOH, and —SO 3 .

column12: HYDROXYPROPYL BETAINE BASED ZWITTERIONIC GEMINAL LIQUIDS, OBTAINING PROCESS AND USE AS WETTABILITY MODIFIERS WITH INHIBITORY/DISPERSANTS PROPERTIES OF ASPHALTENES
column13: The present invention is related to the obtaining and use of zwitterionic geminal liquids based on hydroxypropyl betaine, as wettability modifiers of rocks such as limestone, dolomite, sandstone, quartz or heterogeneous lithologies, in the presence of brines with high content of divalent ions as calcium, magnesium, barium and strontium, at high temperature and high pressure conditions during the application of enhanced oil recovery processes. The zwitterionic geminal liquids based hydroxypropyl betaine of the present invention have also the property of acting as inhibitors/dispersing of asphaltenes, both at extraction and production operations of petroleum industry, thus allowing to increase the level of crude oil production. An additional advantage presented by zwitterionic geminal liquid based on hydroxypropyl betaine which can be dissolved in distilled water, brine, aliphatic hydrocarbons or other polar and nonpolar solvents.
